sections.heading: Punishment
sections.text:
for unauthorized injury of prisoner; forfeiture abolished except when

statutorily authorized.

sections.heading: Inhumanity
sections.text: to prisoners.

sections.heading: Warrant
sections.text: for arrest of escaped prisoner.

sections.heading: Expenses
sections.text: of recapture and return of escaped prisoners.

sections.heading: Authority
sections.text: to offer reward in certain cases.

sections.heading: Expenses
sections.text:
of prosecuting prisoner and person acting in concert with prisoner who escapes

or commits crime while incarcerated.

sections.heading: Recapture
sections.text: and imprisonment.

sections.heading: Penalties
sections.text: for prisoner who escapes.

sections.heading: Manufacture
sections.text:
or possession by prisoner of items adapted, designed or commonly used to escape

prohibited; penalty; exception.

sections.heading: Unauthorized
sections.text: absences which constitute escape from prison; punishment; exception.

sections.heading: Aiding
sections.text: prisoner to escape.

sections.heading: Custodian
sections.text: permitting escape.

sections.heading: Ministerial
sections.text: officer permitting escape.

sections.heading: Concealing
sections.text: escaped prisoner.

sections.heading: Definitions.
sections.text: Definitions.

sections.heading: Contractor�
sections.text: defined.

sections.heading: Employee�
sections.text: defined.

sections.heading: Volunteer�
sections.text: defined.

sections.heading: Unauthorized
sections.text: communication with prisoner.

sections.heading: Communication
sections.text: with person charged or convicted of felony in county jail.

sections.heading: Furnishing
Prohibition
sections.text:
on furnishing portable telecommunications device to prisoner and on possession

of such devices in jail or institution or facility of Department of

Corrections; penalties; petition for modification of sentence.

sections.heading: Furnishing
sections.text: intoxicant to person lawfully confined in jail or detention facility.

sections.heading: Sale
sections.text:
of liquor within half mile of institution of Department of Corrections

unlawful; restriction on granting of new licenses; exception.

sections.heading: Possession
sections.text: or control of dangerous weapon or facsimile by incarcerated person prohibited.

sections.heading: Voluntary
sections.text:
sexual conduct between prisoner and person other than employee of or contractor

or volunteer for prison; penalty.

sections.heading: Sexual
sections.text:
abuse of prisoner or unauthorized custodial conduct by employee of or

contractor or volunteer for prison; penalties.

sections.heading: Unlawful
sections.text:
acts related to human excrement or bodily fluid; penalty; investigation;

testing for communicable diseases; plea bargaining prohibited.

sections.heading: Applicability
sections.text:
of certain provisions to custodian and prisoner assigned to private facility or

institution; training to perform duties of correctional officer at private

facility or institution; reimbursement to State for expenses relating to

prisoner who escapes from private facility or institution.

sections.heading: Penalty.
sections.text: Penalty.

sections.heading: Penalties
sections.text:
for absence without authorization or tampering with electronic device;

restitution.
